item.title: Free Porn!
item.dc:creator: @zp91 zp91
item.description:
@zp91 wrote:

I was wondering if someone could help me get a very quick and easy script and add it into this one? so it runs after the script really quick. Sort of like a check? Thanks heres the script.

[code]program New;
var
x,y : integer;
const
time1=1000;
color=8095364;

Procedure click;
Begin
If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,color,0,0,400,266,1))Then
Begin
ClickMouse(x,y,True);
Wait(time1);
End;
End;

begin
ActivateClient;
Repeat
Click;
Until(IsFKeyDown(3))
end.[/code]

Itâ€™s just a simple color clicker but can someone edit in a little thing to do a quick search for a certain set color and if that color is found press Alt F4? Or set it to click a certain spot like the exit button? Whoever helps me with this is amazing! Thank you in advance! (Going on my mile walk be back soon!)
-Zack :eek:
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2009, 05:12:05 pm[/size][hr]Back guys, any takers? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2009, 06:11:03 pm[/size][hr]Not to active huh?
